availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel Remy (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and tavernkeeper.)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and tavernkeeper. Kentucky native. Married to Frances Ann Ferguson Remy in Johnson County, Kentucky, on May 3, 1846. Father of James E. Remy and Asa Remy. Farmer in Johnson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Tavernkeeper in Johnson County. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, 87A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 256.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, Flatgap Precinct, p. 140B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994043, Johnson County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994043, Johnson County Deaths.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Johnson County Marriages, Film 001912950.
KYR-0001-020-0537.
